attributes.action: Have an open, serious and informed debate about where spending cuts might fall.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cuts in public spending will affect every citizen in the UK (and maybe UK citizens abroad) and whilst tough choices should be made, they must be done with and not to the people of the country. A serious, honest and open public debate should take place before any cuts are made or announced.
